Barack Obama pointed out that Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer had said during an earlier meeting that only one in 10 users of his company's software in China actually pays for it. So it's important, Barack Obama added, to get better enforcement, since that is an area where America excels-- intellectual property and high-value added products and services. She added: Larry Page and Sergey Brin have grown up. They want to run their own company. Simon Cowell has told Oprah Winfrey the secrets of his success and his fear of failure.`` Doing these shows is relentless,'' he said. When the ratings come in you're happy for five minutes, then insecure madness comes in, and you worry about next week. In the notoriously cut-throat music industry, Simon Cowell says he's learned it's crucial not to show weakness to competitors.`` People sometimes react to my confidence in the way that two dogs meet

she said Michael Vick 's dogfighting operation probably helped pit bulls' bad rep because it showed that`` people can reintroduce these dogs back into a society that's not going to abuse them.'' The owner is responsible for what an animal does. It's totally your behavior, whether you have a good dog that minds well and is not a problem to society or you turn it into a vicious animal that will bite the mailman, the girl next door or grandma walking down the street, Michael Hansen said. Betsy Adevai, 50, of Grand Rapids, Mich., said muscle dogs have become status symbols for young men who walk through her inner city neighborhood.
